parameter.name: AuthenticationServerRedirectUrl
parameter.description: URL to sign in with the Single Sign On authorization server. Redirect users here when not authenticated.

parameter.name: AuthorizationStoredProcedureName
parameter.description: Name of the stored procedure to call in the Single Sign On database to retrieve which resources the user is authorized to access.

parameter.name: SsoAppId
parameter.description: How the Single Sign On database refers to this web application..

parameter.name: RulesFileFolder
parameter.description: Relative(to the 'bin' folder at deployment time) or Absolute, or UNC file path to the directory hosting the *.rules text files. Code correctly handles with/without trailing slash. (required for the Rules Engine).

parameter.name: RuleEngineResultsSchema
parameter.description: Database schema inside the ODS database that stores the Rules engine output.

parameter.name: UseFakeViewModelData
parameter.description: If true, dependency injection containers will register Test or Mock version of services for simple unit testing.

parameter.name: UseSimulatedSSO
parameter.description: If true, will override all requests, passing in the name of the simulated SSO User.

parameter.name: EnvironmentName
parameter.description: Displays at the top of all pages; hidden if set to 'Production'.

parameter.name: SessionStateConnectionString
parameter.description: Connection string to use for ASP session state server
